-Everybody was there. Shit was crazy. -Did you drive your Impala there?
translation.ko: 다들 참석했죠 끝내주는 파티였어요 그때 임팔라를 몰았습니까?

translation.en: Again, the vehicle has not been driven by my client for more than six months.

translation.en: Are you sure? Forensics is going to run all sorts of tests on it.

translation.en: I drove a '95 Cutlass, a rental. Was waiting on it when Biggie got shot.

I was in the garage. You can check the surveillance cameras.

translation.en: What color were their Jordans?
Okay, let's back up. Did you see Biggie and Puffy at the party?

translation.en: Yeah. I spoke to 'em.
Was that the first time or did you know 'em?
I know 'em a little bit.
What does that mean? Did you do security for Biggie?

translation.en: You need to understand. He will only talk about where he was

translation.en: and what he was doing the night of the shooting.

translation.en: -That is the deal. -That is bullshit.
Keefe, I don't like you for this murder, okay? But I have some simple questions.

translation.en: -I just need you to answer them. -You took my car. Word is out.
translation.ko: 간단한 질문들이니 대답만 해줘요 내 차를 가져갔잖아요 소문 다 났어요

translation.en: Shit, it's a target on my head, homie.
He just wants to clear his name. That is all.

translation.en: Fine, Keefe. Fine. What did you talk about with Biggie and Puffy that night?
translation.ko: 좋아요, 키피, 좋다고요 그날 비기랑 퍼피를 만나 무슨 얘기를 했죠?

translation.en: Nothin'. You know, they was drinking, said what's up, how you doin'?

translation.en: Okay. And that's it?
Did you see anyone who might want to hurt Biggie?

translation.en: -I didn't see nothin'. -How about in general?
translation.ko: 아무도 못 봤어요 그럼 평소에 비기를 해칠 만한 사람은?

translation.en: -Who would want to hurt Biggie? -Shit, you guys know.
translation.ko: 그럼 평소에 비기를 해칠 만한 사람은? 젠장, 댁들도 알잖아요

translation.en: No, what does that mean? Death Row? Suge? Suge?

translation.en: -Not sayin' nothin' either. -That's the problem. Nobody says anything.

translation.en: Meanwhile people's lives get destroyed. This isn’t about Biggie being famous.

translation.en: -This mentality has to stop. -This interview is over.
translation.ko: 비기가 유명해서가 아니라 이런 사고방식을 멈춰야 한다고요 면담은 끝입니다

translation.en: We’ll have to talk to him again, anyway.
translation.ko: 왜 이래요 어차피 또 볼 텐데

translation.en: He did not do it and you know it. Thank you, gentlemen.
Has to stop, Keefe! [sighs]
[Daryn] What do you think?
I think it's a lot of bragging about his dick and drug-dealing.
translation.ko: 자기 물건이랑 마약 파는 거 자랑이 많은 것 같네

translation.en: That’s what I think.
Biggie was a storyteller, liked to exaggerate.
You want politics, I'll hit with you some Tupac.
translation.ko: 정치적인 걸 원하면 - 투팍 명곡도 들려줄게 - 됐어

translation.en: No, I'll pass, thank you. What are you reading?
translation.ko: 고맙지만 사양할게 - 뭐 읽고 있어? - 다시 읽는 건데

translation.en: -About Death Row. -You read the book about Poole?
translation.ko: 데스 로 얘기야 풀 책은 읽었어?

translation.en: I've read every book about Biggie, Pac, this case, seen every documentary too.
translation.ko: 비기와 팍에 관한 책은 다 읽었어 이 사건은 다큐멘터리도 다 봤지

translation.en: That’s good. That means I don’t have to.
translation.ko: 그거 잘됐네 난 안 봐도 되겠어

translation.en: -[Brian] Knock, knock. -There he is.
Daryn, this is our supervisor, Brian Tyndall.
translation.ko: 대린, 이쪽은 감독관이신 브라이언 틴들 씨

translation.en: -Thanks for having me onboard. -Thank your boyfriend.
translation.ko: 불러주셔서 감사합니다 감사는 자네 남자 친구한테 해 또 누구를 부르고 싶어?

translation.en: Who else you want to bring in?
translation.ko: 감사는 자네 남자 친구한테 해 또 누구를 부르고 싶어?

translation.en: I was thinking we could make this a federal task force.
Yeah, that's ain’t going to happen.
What do you...
You told me that I could have whatever I want. Whoever I want.

translation.en: -And I gave you this guy. -Still using a cloned cell phone?

translation.en: That was five years ago.
Stupid mistake I more than paid the price for.

translation.en: We all got our crosses. Okay. Why federal?

translation.en: The Torres case was federal and that's why I'm here.
translation.ko: 토레스 사건이 그랬어요 그래서 이번 일 수락했고요

translation.en: -This is different. -You're damn right.
This murder happened ten years ago and the victim was famous.
-There aren't gonna be new players here. -You're losing me.

translation.en: We are going to have to lean on people, like we’ve never leaned on them before.
translation.ko: 사람들에게 기대 봐야 합니다 굉장히 많이 기대야 해요

translation.en: -Even if I agreed with you-- -How it's going to look?
How's what going to look?
Voletta Wallace believes that the LAPD. played a direct part in her son's murder

translation.en: and now only members of the LAPD. are going to help prove her right or wrong?

translation.en: [exhales] It's a big ask.
It will take some time, but I'll work on it.
Please do. Thank you.
I have good news and bad news. What do you want first?

translation.en: -It’s up to you. -Shell casings found at scene are rare.
translation.ko: - 뭐부터 들을래? - 마음대로 하세요 현장에서 발견된 탄피 희귀한 제품이야

translation.en: -How rare? -Only two distributors in the country.
Makes matching the casings to a suspect easier. The bad news?

translation.en: Keefe D.'s Impala. Nothing inside ties it to the shooting.
translation.ko: - 나쁜 소식은요? - 키피 D의 임팔라 차량 내부에 총격 흔적이 전혀 없어

translation.en: We can't determine the last time it was driven.
translation.ko: 마지막 운전 시기도 알 수 없지만

translation.en: -But if we can connect Keefe to the ammo-- -How do we do that?
translation.ko: 키피랑 그 총알을 어떻게 엮을 수 있으면... 총도 못 엮는데 총알을 어떻게 엮어요?

translation.en: We can't even connect him to a gun.
translation.ko: 총도 못 엮는데 총알을 어떻게 엮어요?

translation.en: Jesus Christ, easy.
Just saying he wasn't exactly an open book to us.
Who is? Who is open with us?
Yes, I remember your speech. That was very moving.

translation.en: We need to show Kevin Gaines’ picture to witnesses.
This shit again.
You think Wilshire only got a tip about Keefe D.? They got hundreds.
translation.ko: 윌셔에서 키피 D 정보만 받았겠어요? 수백 건은 돼요

translation.en: I read every single one. Guess what. One said Gaines might have been involved.
translation.ko: 제가 다 읽어봤어요 어땠게요? 누군가 게인스가 연루됐다고 했죠

translation.en: So Gaines was banging Suge Knight's ex while also acting as a hitman for him?
translation.ko: 그러니까 게인스가 슈그의 전처랑 자면서 동시에 슈그의 킬러 역할도 했다고?

translation.en: -I didn't say that. -It sounds like what you’re saying
translation.ko: 그 말이 아니잖아요 정확히 그 말로 들려 뒷받침할 증거도 없고

translation.en: with no evidence to back it up. If it leaks, Russ,
translation.ko: 정확히 그 말로 들려 뒷받침할 증거도 없고 네가 그렇게 몰아가다 언론에 새어 나가면

translation.en: the press won't care, if you don't have any evidence, okay?
translation.ko: 네가 그렇게 몰아가다 언론에 새어 나가면 증거가 있든 없든 기사 쏟아져

translation.en: No, that’s a nightmare for the department.
-Okay, but we need to consult Vegas PD. -Vegas?
There is a real possibility that the murder of Biggie Smalls

translation.en: is related to the murder of Tupac. It's our job--
translation.ko: 분명한 가능성이 있어요 이건 우리 일...

translation.en: That’s our job? Or is it your excuse not to go home to your sad, lonely apartment?

translation.en: Give me a little goddamn credit here. You got those pictures of your family,

translation.en: but not once have I seen you ever talk to your wife.

translation.en: [cop] Poole, you got a visitor.
[Russ sighs] Miss Wallace?
Yes. You are Detective Russell Poole, the one now investigating my son's murder?

translation.en: That’s right, me and my partner. Yeah.
Why haven't you called me?
Ma’am, I'm very sorry for your loss, but I wasn't the first detective to...

translation.en: No, you're right.
You’re right. I should have called you.
I promise this department will do whatever it takes to find out who killed your son.

translation.ko: 신경 쓸 거라는 얘기를 믿으라는 건가요?

translation.en: -I care. I care very much. -Why?
Why did I have to come see you?

translation.en: I knew nothing about Notorious B.I.G. or Biggie Smalls.

So, no, I cannot help you.
I just wanted to meet the man in charge.

translation.en: Would you tell me... Uh...
Would you tell me about Christopher?

His father left us when he was two years old,
translation.ko: 그 아이가 2살일 때 애 아빠는 떠났지만

translation.en: but I raised Christopher to be a positive person...
...to cherish life every single day.
They say he dealt drugs when he was younger,
but I never wanted to believe that.
"Not my Christopher," I would say.
I didn’t know that part of him.
I didn’t know so many things they said about him.

translation.en: I never even listened to his music until after he died.

translation.en: His songs were grotesque stories...
...about the stink of this world.

translation.ko: 하지만 제 귀에는 참 아름답게 들리기도 했죠

translation.en: Christopher was loyal.
Christopher was a giver.
And all this stuff about him and Tupac...
translation.ko: 그리고 크리스토퍼와 투팍에 관한 온갖 얘기들...

translation.en: They were friends.
Do you hear me?
Him and Tupac were friends.
Yo, dog. I can't believe you worked with Janet Jackson.
translation.ko: 네가 재닛 잭슨이랑 일했다니 못 믿겠어

translation.en: I been feelin' honeys since Diff’rent Strokes.
Shit had a nigga running around like I was Willis.

translation.en: Shit. They asked me to take an AIDS test.
Say word? For a movie?
No lie. Everybody came at me.
First the producer came, then the director came.
translation.ko: 처음엔 제작자가 오더니 다음엔 감독이 오더라

translation.en: I told 'em if I was really going to hit that, then I'll take four tests.
translation.ko: 난 진짜 하게 해주면 네 번도 받겠다고 했지

translation.en: Otherwise hell, no, that shit's disrespectful.
But you and Janet tight, right?
Shit, home girl changed her number up on me.
Had me thinking we'd play paintball after we wrap.
Damn, she plays you like that?
This business is dirty. You got to keep your boys close.
translation.ko: 이 업계가 더러워 너희 애들 단속 잘해

translation.en: So, my boys all hoping I get on your status.
translation.ko: 우리 애들은 다 내가 너처럼 되길 바라

translation.en: You trying to be like Pac? 'Cause I ain't just starring in movies.
translation.ko: 뭐, 팍처럼 되려고? 영화만 찍는 게 아니거든

translation.en: I'm writing 'em, producing 'em, on top of my music.
translation.ko: 대본도 쓰고 제작도 해 음악 활동에 더해서 말야

translation.en: Shit. The hustle don't stop, baby.
-It's a different type of hustle. -Mm.
Let me hit that.
Let me show you something.
Damn, dog. You read all this?
I ain't out here just rapping about money and bitches.
translation.ko: 돈이랑 여자 가사만으로 여기서 벗어날 생각은 없어

translation.en: There's levels to this thug-life shit.
Hey... Machiavelli?
Yeah.
"Men are driven by two principal impulses, either by love or by fear."
translation.ko: '사람을 움직이는 주요한 자극 두 가지는 사랑과 두려움이다'

translation.en: He the shit.
You tryin' to rob a bank or something?
[as Al Pacino] Hey, man. You say hello to my little friend.
-[laughs] -You buggin’, dog.
Nigga, they ain't loaded. Go ahead.
translation.ko: 총알 안 들어 있어 너도 해 봐

translation.en: -Shit, up in there. -Mm.
[chuckles] Yeah, baby.
-Hey. -Hey. Uh...
-You okay? -Yeah, what is it?
So, Compton P.D. called. Detective wanted to relay some info about Keefe D.
translation.ko: 콤프턴 경찰 쪽에서 키피 D에 관한 정보를 전달하고 싶대

translation.en: What kind of information?
Keefe's got a nephew, guy named Orlando Anderson.
translation.ko: 키피한테 조카가 하나 있는데 이름은 올랜도 앤더슨

translation.en: -Who's Orlando Anderson? -Might be the guy that killed Tupac.
translation.ko: - 올랜도 앤더슨이 누구죠? - 투팍을 죽였을지도 모르는 사람

translation.en: Yep, they like him for it.
-And Keefe's his uncle? -Yeah. And they're real close.
translation.ko: - 키피가 그놈 삼촌이고요? - 그래, 그리고 엄청 친하다는군

translation.en: So, I was thinking, maybe we should take that trip up to Vegas after all, huh?
translation.ko: 생각해 보니, 결국은 베이거스로 가야 할지도 모르겠네?

translation.en: Tyndall came through.
Got the green light to go outside the LAPD. for the task force.
translation.ko: 특별 수사반이 LA 경찰을 벗어나도 된대

translation.en: Feds, Compton, whoever we need.
-Took him long enough. -Yeah.
I was starting to get worried I was going to be stuck in here with you forever.
translation.ko: 너랑 여기 영영 갇힐까 봐 걱정되던 차였는데

translation.en: Yeah, you wish.
What?
[Daryn] Biggie was 24 when he was killed.
Tupac was 25.
Kids, man.
-[Greg] I just want to solve this thing. -Wherever it leads.
translation.ko: 난 이 사건을 해결하고 싶어 사건이 이끄는 대로

translation.en: Wherever it leads.
